Job Title: Accounting Manager

Location: Parsippany, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
About Us Dealer Owned Warranty Company is the fastest growing service contract administrator in the US. As the #1 provider for warranty and insurance products in the automotive industry, we are dedicated to providing exceptional and outstanding service for our clients. We have many opportunities for growth within our organization and looking to bring on top talent across many departments. All of our positions are fully on-site in Parsippany, NJ. 
Job SummaryThe Accounting Manager in the Corporate Accounting department oversees all aspects of the department including leading and overseeing all work, managing the Corporate Accounting team in all aspects including work performance and general administrative duties. The Accounting Manager in the Corporate Accounting department focuses on supporting the overall accounting processes, month end close, financial reporting, audits, A/P & A/R and ensuring compliance with GAAP. Duties/ResponsibilitiesOversee preparation of timely bank and GL reconciliations Manage Accounts Payable functions include and make sure bills are paid timely and accurately Oversee A/R functions, including processing receipts and collections on aged accountsPrepare Financial Statements and supporting schedules timely and accurately Make sure all journal entries are posted timely and accurately Perform ADHOC analysis and completes projects as needed Prepare clear and concise documentation of all work performed Completes all managerial administrative tasks for Corporate Accounting team Follow established processes and recommend improvements Other duties will be at the discretion of management.
Required Skills & Experience Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or Finance 5+ years of experience in corporate accounting Proven leadership experience Strong knowledge of GAAP and reconciliations Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills Proficiency in Excel and Microsoft Office Excellent time management skills and ability to meet deadlines 
Physical RequirementsProlonged periods of sitting at a desk and working on a computer.Must be able to lift up to 15 pounds at a time.

DOWC is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by law. Applicants who require accommodation to participate in the job application process may contact us for assistance.

Experience Level (if available): None
